channel.title: Nobody has figured this out for me
channel.description:
I'm currently editing off a server called RealisticScape which is wonderful by the way alexia!, anyway I have made a mini game where its free for all combat. I would like to know if somone could please give me a code so that if i die while in a certain area I will respawn back at the minigame, and I was also wondering how I could not lose my stuff while in that area when I die. If you cant do the above could you please tell me how to not lose my stuff when i die anywhere?
LOL REMMEBER IM KINDA NOOBY SO IF YOU DO KNOW EXPLAIN THEM GOOD PLZ.

item.title: Nobody has figured this out for me
item.dc:creator: @steve4448 steve4448
item.description:
@steve4448 wrote:

yup … as t cups said … justchange your respawn location when you die to he coords of your choice (eg) 3333 3333 (thats near varrock … near digsite)

Read full topic
item.source: Nobody has figured this out for me
